content:
C.J PERIOD Black scores two of his  points over Vandy center Greg LaPoint during the Vols  victory

C.J PERIOD Black and Rashard Lee stepped up in the second half to lead the Vols

to a  victory against Vanderbilt on Saturday night PERIOD

Black has been a consistent leader for UT this year and he proved on

Saturday night that he can hit the big shot with the game on the line PERIOD

 Black said PERIOD 

Lee has had to make the most of his limited minutes this season and

Saturday was no different as the senior scored  points in  minutes PERIOD

Lee was forced into the spotlight due to some controversial fouls called on

Vincent Yarbrough and the fact that Aaron Greene is sidelined with an

injury PERIOD

 Lee said PERIOD

UT came out of the locker room trailing  at the beginning of the

second half PERIOD A quick flurry of offense by the Vols combined with a

fiveminute scoring drought from the Commodores gave them the lead and the

confidence to pull off a win in front of over  at ThompsonBoling

Arena PERIOD

Guard Vegas Davis is mugged by Vandys Dan Langhi while going after a loose ball

Black and Lee were key components in putting the Vols on top and keeping

them there PERIOD

It all started with a powerful putback slam by Black which pulled the Vols

to within two points of Vandy with  to go in the game PERIOD

After a couple of missed free throws by the Commodores Black once again

worked the paint for a score and a foul PERIOD He connected on the free throw to

tie up the game at  apiece PERIOD

With UT trailing by two on the next possession Lee had an easy layup

thanks to a beautiful nolook behindthehead pass from Tony Harris PERIOD

After another defensive stand Lee found Black open under the goal to put

the Vols up by two with under  minutes to play PERIOD

Lee then hit a big 3pointer from the left side to give the Vols a 

lead with  to go PERIOD

Blacks second block of the night  putting him just two blocks shy of the

Tennessee career record held by Reggie Johnson   resulted in a trip

to the charity stripe for Black on the other end PERIOD Black knocked down both

shots to put the Vols up  with  remaining on the clock PERIOD

Senior Brandon Wharton snatches a rebound from the grasp of several Vanderbilt players

The Commodores managed to keep it close thanks to Dan Langhis 16for16

performance from the foul line PERIOD

However after the last official timeout Lee hit a layup from a Wharton

pass that broke down the Vandy defense PERIOD

With just over a minute to go and the Vols up by one Lee had an open look

for a 3pointer from the right side but couldnt get the shot to go down PERIOD

Although some fans didnt agree with Lees shot selection coach Jerry

Green supported his senior forward PERIOD

 Green said PERIOD



On the ensuing Vandy possession Langhi gave the Commodores a  lead

with  ticks left on the clock PERIOD

After a Tennessee timeout Black found the ball in his hands with the game

on the line PERIOD Black laid a hook shot off the glass to give the Vols a 

lead with  seconds left PERIOD

 Black said PERIOD 

The defense held up for the Vols and the Big Orange improved its home

record to  this season PERIOD

Lee explained how the unpredictable Vandy defense would help the Vols in

the future PERIOD

 he said PERIOD
